name: Al Dora Residence Suites Hurghada
description: With a stay at Aldora Residence suites, you'll be centrally located in Hurghada, within a 10-minute drive of Hurghada City Center and Marina Hurghada. This spa guesthouse is 0.5 mi (0.8 km) from Red Sea and 1.5 mi (2.5 km) from Abdulmoneim Riadh Mosque. Take time to pamper yourself with a visit to the full-service spa. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, which include 4 outdoor swimming pools and a health club. Additional features at this guesthouse include concierge services, gift shops/newsstands, and a television in a common area. Enjoy a meal at the restaurant or snacks in the guesthouse's 2 coffee shops/cafes. Mingle with other guests at the complimentary reception, held daily. Relax with a refreshing drink from the poolside bar or one of the 3 bars/lounges. Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage, and laundry facilities. Make yourself at home in one of the 32 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and Smart televisions. Complimentary wireless internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

name: Sky View Suites Hotel
description: With a stay at this aparthotel in Hurghada (Dahar), you'll be steps from Abdulmoneim Riadh Mosque and a 3-minute drive from Hurghada City Center. This beach aparthotel is 3.3 mi (5.2 km) from Marina Hurghada and 20.6 mi (33.1 km) from El Gouna Beach. Relax on the private beach or enjoy other recreational amenities such as an outdoor pool. This aparthotel also features complimentary wireless internet access, concierge services, and a banquet hall. Enjoy a meal at the restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the aparthotel's room service (during limited hours). Relax with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge or the poolside bar. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 7:00 AM to 11:00 AM. Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage. A shuttle from the airport to the hotel is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite. Make yourself comfortable in this individually furnished apartment, featuring a kitchen with a full-sized refrigerator/freezer and an oven. Your pillowtop bed comes with Egyptian cotton sheets. There's a private furnished balcony. A 32-inch flat-screen television with satellite programming provides entertainment, while wireless internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected.

name: Tiba Rose Plaza
description: With a stay at Tiba Rose Plaza, you'll be centrally located in Hurghada, a 3-minute drive from Hurghada City Center and 7 minutes from Marina Hurghada. This beach hotel is 0.1 mi (0.2 km) from Red Sea and 1.3 mi (2.2 km) from Saint Shenouda Coptic Orthodox Church. Head down to the water and enjoy a day at the private beach, or take advantage of other recreational amenities including an outdoor pool and a sauna. Additional amenities at this hotel include complimentary wireless internet access, concierge services, and lifeguards on site. Satisfy your appetite at one of the hotel's 2 restaurants. Relax with a refreshing drink at the beach bar, the poolside bar, or one of 2 bars/lounges. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 7:00 AM to 9:00 AM. Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, multilingual staff, and a safe deposit box at the front desk. Make yourself at home in one of the 34 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms with shower/tub combinations are provided

name: Bahga Palace 3 Residential Apartments
description: Located in the lively district of Sakala, Bahga Palace 3 is a 5-minute drive from the Red Sea. Guests can benefit from free Wi-Fi in the hotel and the open-air terrace that overlooks the city and Red Sea. Tiled floors, wooden furniture, and warm colours are part of the modern décor. Each apartment offers a living room with a dining area, a satellite TV and a wardrobe, while the kitchen includes an oven and a fridge. Bahga Palace 3 is located next to Sheraton Street which is ideally close to cafes, bazaars and cinema. Hurghada Airport is a 5-minute drive from Bahga Palace 3. Free public parking is possible at a location nearby.
address: Madares Street, In front of Al Yasmin Supermarket near Electric Company,Hurghada,Red Sea Governorate,Egypt

Make yourself at home in one of the 633 air-conditioned guestrooms. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless internet access is available to keep you connected. name: Empire Hotel Aqua Park
description: Located in Hurghada’s downtown Al-Dahar district, this hotel provides spacious rooms with private balconies overlooking the outdoor pool or city. It features a private beach only 1148 feet away. The spacious air-conditioned rooms of Royal Star Empire Hotel Aqua Park have private bathrooms. Each is also equipped with satellite TV and a mini fridge, as well as a safe. Besides buffet-style dining, Triton Empire offers three specialty restaurants, including the Belgian Chez Pascal and the Italian Dolce Vita who offer international cuisine. The Peanuts Bar serves drinks and food in a lively atmosphere with live music. Guest can relax all day on poolside sun loungers. For relaxation the Royal Star Empire Hotel Aqua Park has a health club with a hot tub, sauna and hammam. There are also on-site shops selling souvenirs and jewelry. Many shops and restaurants surround the Royal Star Empire Hotel Aqua Park. It is a 15-minute drive from Hurghada International Airport.

name: Golden Rose Hotel
description: Golden Rose Hotel, situated in Hurghada’s Sakalla district, is 200 metres from the sandy beaches of the Red Sea. All rooms of the Golden Rose Hotel have satellite TV. A seating area is included with some rooms. All rooms are simply furnished and most have a safety deposit box. The Golden Rose organises water activities such as diving, windsurfing and snorkelling. Staff at the hotel’s tour desk can provide information on excursions. Local and international buffet-style and à la carte meals are served in Golden Rose’s restaurant. Refreshing beverages and snacks are offered at the hotel’s bar. Hurghada International Airport is less than a 10-minute drive away.
address: Sheraton Road, Pappas Beach El Arosa Square,Hurghada,Red Sea Governorate,Egypt

name: Turtle's Inn El Gouna
description: Turtle-s Inn is a small intimate 3 star guest house located in the heart of the famous Abu Tig Marina in El Gouna with access to many restaurants; bars and upscale boutiques. A small pool gets you a chance to refresh or follow a diving course with the in house diving center. A gastronomical Belgian restaurant is housed on the roof top terrace. Free access to the Marina Beach and to the nearby Hotel Ali Pasha swimming pool. El Gouna is known for its outdoor activities and water sports as well as its green engagement to protect the environment. With unique coral reefs; diverse marine life and clear waters it is especially popular for scuba diving. The night life is also good with a variety of choices. El Gouna is about 25 km from Hurghada and is easily accessible from the international airport. It is set along kilometers of beachfront with seawater lagoons islets and unique architecture.It has received the Green Star certificate for its environment protection efforts.
address: El Gouna, Hurghada,El Gouna,Red Sea Governorate,Egypt

name: Captain's Inn
description: CAPTAINS INN - an intimate Red Sea hotel offering comfortable accommodation in Egypts best marina. This 3 stars hotel offers an intimate atmosphere in picturesque surroundings with modern yet comfortable accommodation and amenities. Overviewing Abu Tig Marina in El Gouna Captains Inn grants guests modern and comfortable accommodation and a Steakhouse speciality restaurant at one of the most enviable location in all of El Gouna the Marina promenade. Very close to the beach and kitestations you have full access to all watersports and activities offered in El Gouna. Captains Inn guest also have a free access to the Ali Pasha Swimming pool.El Gouna is an integrated town along the Red Sea coast with sandy beaches- man made lagoons and islands. Boasting a superb infrastructure and excellent services. It is Egypt most environmental friendly location and Captains Inn has received the Green Star certificate for its environment policy. El Gouna offers all activities for your holiday windsurfing- kitesurfing- diving-snorkeling-USPGA Golf Course- international spa. But you can also relax at the beach where the sun shines all year round.

name: Pickalbatros Aqua Vista Resort - Hurghada
description: With a stay at Pickalbatros Aqua Vista Resort - Hurghada in Hurghada (Village Road), you'll be within a 15-minute drive of Red Sea and Marina Hurghada. This beach hotel is 10.1 mi (16.3 km) from Hurghada City Center and 2.3 mi (3.8 km) from Hurghada Museum. Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, which include 5 outdoor swimming pools, a nightclub, and a water park. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless internet access, concierge services, and gift shops/newsstands. Getting to nearby attractions is a breeze with the area shuttle (surcharge). Enjoy Italian cuisine at Soprano, one of the hotel's 4 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of the 24-hour room service. Relax with a refreshing drink from the poolside bar or one of the 6 bars/lounges. A complimentary buffet breakfast is included. Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage. Guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle for a surcharge, and free self parking is available onsite. Make yourself at home in one of the 326 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Your room comes with a pillowtop bed. Rooms have private balconies. Complimentary wireless internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers.

name: Marlin Inn Azur Resort
description: With a stay at Marlin Inn Azur Resort in Hurghada (Al Mamsha El Seyahi), you'll be within a 10-minute drive of Marina Hurghada and Hurghada City Center. This family-friendly hotel is 0.2 mi (0.4 km) from Red Sea and 0.4 mi (0.6 km) from Sindbad Aqua Park. Head down to the water and enjoy a day at the private beach, or take advantage of other recreational amenities including an outdoor pool and a sauna. All-inclusive rates are available at this hotel. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities. You can enjoy a meal at the restaurant serving the guests of Marlin Inn Azur Resort, or stop in at the snack bar/deli. Relax with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge or the poolside bar. Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and laundry facilities. Free self parking is available onsite. Make yourself at home in one of the 419 air-conditioned rooms featuring LCD televisions. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment. Bathrooms have deep soaking bathtubs and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and complimentary bottled water, and housekeeping is provided daily.

name: Iberotel Casa Del Mar Resort
description: Centrally located in Hurghada downtown and only 10 minutes drive to Hurghada International Airport sits the 4 stars Jaz Casa Del Mar Resort. The resort features 199 well-designed guest rooms and suites equipped with the amenities and facilities needed during the stay.

name: Zen Resort by Tbh Hotels
description: With a stay at Zen Resort by TBH Hotels in Sahl Hasheeh, you'll be steps from Red Sea and a 3-minute drive from Old Town Sahl Hasheesh. This resort is 17.2 mi (27.7 km) from Marina Hurghada and 19 mi (30.6 km) from Hurghada City Center. Spend the day on the private beach or dip into one of the 2 outdoor swimming pools. This resort also features complimentary wireless internet access, concierge services, and gift shops/newsstands. The complimentary beach shuttle makes getting to the surf and sand a breeze. All-inclusive rates are available at this resort. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities. Enjoy a meal at the restaurant or snacks in the coffee shop/cafe. The resort also offers room service (during limited hours). Mingle with other guests at the complimentary reception, held daily. Relax with a refreshing drink from the beach bar or one of the 2 bars/lounges. Continental breakfasts are available daily from 7:00 AM to 10:00 AM for a fee. Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Free self parking is available onsite. Make yourself at home in one of the 58 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include safes and electric kettles, and housekeeping is provided daily.

name: Magic Beach Hotel Hurghada
description: With a stay at Magic Beach Hotel Hurghada, you'll be centrally located in Hurghada, within a 5-minute drive of Red Sea and Hurghada City Center. This all-inclusive hotel is 3.9 mi (6.3 km) from Marina Hurghada and 18 mi (28.9 km) from El Gouna Golf Club. Relax on the private beach or enjoy other recreational amenities such as an outdoor pool. This hotel is all inclusive. Rates include meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities. You can enjoy a meal at the restaurant serving the guests of Magic Beach Hotel Hurghada, or stop in at the snack bar/deli. Relax with a refreshing drink from the beach bar or one of the 2 bars/lounges. Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage, and an elevator. Free self parking is available onsite. Make yourself at home in one of the 122 air-conditioned rooms featuring fireplaces and LCD televisions. Your Select Comfort bed comes with premium bedding. Wireless internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include safes and desks, as well as phones with free local calls
address: El Helal District in front of,Hurghada,Red Sea Governorate,Egypt

name: Sunny Days Palma de Mirette Resort & Spa
description: With a stay at Sunny Days Palma De Mirette Resorts & Spa in Hurghada (Dahar), you'll be within a 5-minute drive of Hurghada City Center and Red Sea. This all-inclusive property is 2.4 mi (3.8 km) from Marina Hurghada and 20.7 mi (33.3 km) from El Gouna Golf Club. Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. After dipping into one of the 2 outdoor swimming pools, you can spend some time at the private beach. Additional amenities at this property include complimentary wireless internet access, babysitting (surcharge), and an arcade/game room. This property is all inclusive. Rates include meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities. Enjoy international cuisine at Andalusia, one of the property's 4 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of the 24-hour room service. Snacks are also available at the 5 coffee shops/cafes. Relax with a refreshing drink at the beach bar, the poolside bar, or one of 6 bars/lounges. Featured amenities include a business center, express check-out, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Event facilities at this property consist of a conference center and meeting rooms. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite. Make yourself at home in one of the 196 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars (stocked with some free items). Rooms have private balconies or patios. Cable television is provided for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryer

name: Sunny Days El Palacio Resort & Spa
description: With a stay at Sunny Days El Palacio Resort & Spa, you'll be centrally located in Hurghada, a 3-minute drive from Hurghada City Center and 5 minutes from Marina Hurghada. This all-inclusive property is 0.1 mi (0.1 km) from Red Sea and 2.1 mi (3.3 km) from Al Mina Mosque. Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages, body treatments, and facials. Enjoy international cuisine at Mirette Resturant, one of the property's 4 restaurants, or stay in and take advantage of the 24-hour room service. Snacks are also available at the 5 coffee shops/cafes. When you are in need of a refreshing drink, visit the poolside bar or one of 5 bars/lounges, or 3 beach bars. Featured amenities include a business center, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Planning an event in Hurghada? This property has 10764 square feet (1000 square meters) of space consisting of a conference center and a meeting room. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite. Make yourself at home in one of the 827 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LED televisions. Cable television is provided for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and coffee/tea makers.

name: Sphinx Aqua Park Beach Resort
description: With a stay at Sphinx Aqua Park Beach Resort - All Inclusive in Hurghada (Dahar), you'll be steps from Red Sea and 12 minutes by foot from Hurghada City Center. This all-inclusive property is 4.8 mi (7.7 km) from Marina Hurghada and 20.1 mi (32.4 km) from El Gouna Golf Club. Treat yourself with massages, body treatments, and facials. Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free valet parking is available onsite. Make yourself at home in one of the 233 guestrooms featuring refrigerators. name: Seagull Beach Resort - Families and Couples Only
description: A stay at Seagull Beach Resort Families & Couples Only - All Inclusive places you in the heart of Hurghada, a 2-minute drive from Marina Hurghada and 7 minutes from Abdulmoneim Riadh Mosque. name: LABRANDA Club Makadi
description: Located in Makadi Bay, LABRANDA Club Makadi is a 2-minute drive from Red Sea and 10 minutes from Big Dayz Water Sport Center. This beach resort is 25.1 mi (40.5 km) from Marina Hurghada and 26.9 mi (43.3 km) from Hurghada City Center. Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages. You can soak up the sun at the private beach or enjoy other recreational amenities including outdoor tennis courts and an outdoor pool. Additional amenities at this resort include complimentary wireless internet access, concierge services, and babysitting (surcharge). Make yourself at home in one of the 339 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LED televisions. Rooms have private balconies. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment.
